assessments.status_rationale: No ADP data for November 2025 is referenced in today's news; the report is due in early December and the deadline is still ahead.
No confirmed 10-year yield close at or below 3.90% is cited; verification requires market data through 2025-12-31.
No report of an S&P 500 single-session drop of at least 1.8% appears in today's coverage; outcome remains open until 2025-12-20.
Today's news does not establish BTC trading at or below $75,000; requires price data before 2025-12-31.
No settlement level for Dutch TTF front-month at or below €35/MWh is mentioned; needs exchange data by year-end.
No clear update on CISA KEV additions is provided; must check the KEV catalog for entries dated 2025-11-22 to 2025-12-10.
No official UK gov.uk press release on new Russia-related sanctions is cited; deadline is 2025-12-20.
No evidence on ON RRP usage at or below $25B; requires Federal Reserve daily data through 2025-12-31.
No ERCOT hourly wind peak is reported; need system operations data to confirm any ≥38,500 MW hour by year-end.
The performance window has just opened and today's news does not establish a ≥1.5 pp underperformance of RSP vs SPY; outcome remains open until 2025-12-31 close.
